medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffused abdominal pain localizing to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) over the past 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior with diffuse abdominal pain that later localized to the RLQ. There are no associated symptoms of nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, or changes in bowel habits.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Seizure disorder; history of blood clots in the years prior. No previous episodes of abdominal pain.
